en_definition: a notice, picture or film telling people about a product, job or service
a famous person
real; exactly what it appears to be; not artificial
to tell the public about a product or a service in order to encourage people to buy or to use it
different from what is usual or normal
zh_definition: 特别的；不寻常的；罕见的

en_definition: similar in every detail
different from something; against something
zh_definition: 与之相异的；相对立的；相反的

en_definition: to see or notice a person or thing
a small round area that has a different colour or feels different from the surface it is on
a particular area or place
to make somebody believe something which is not true, especially in order to cheat them
something that you do to make somebody believe something which is not true, or to annoy somebody as a joke
one thousand million
tending to follow what is done or considered acceptable by society in general; normal and ordinary, and perhaps not very interesting
zh_definition: 依照惯例的；遵循习俗的；墨守成规的；普通平凡的

en_definition: to make a product available to the public for the first time
to start an activity, especially an organized one
zh_definition: 开始从事，发起，发动（尤指有组织的活动）

en_definition: a person who starts a new fashion or makes it popular
an official written agreement
to make a legal agreement with somebody for them to work for you or provide you with a service
to give somebody a job
to pay money to borrow something for a short time
a business or an organization that provides a particular service especially on behalf of other businesses or organizations
zh_definition: 服务机构；（尤指）代理机构，经销机构

en_definition: a thing that is expensive and enjoyable but not essential
the enjoyment of special and expensive things
to show something to people
an arrangement of things in a public place to inform or entertain people or advertise something for sale
something that you have bought
the act or process of buying something
to buy something
a small amount or example of something that can be looked at or tried to see what it is like
a number of people or things taken from a larger group and used in tests to provide information about the group
zh_definition: （作为标准或代表的）样品，货样

en_definition: used when adding something to support an idea or argument
a scientist who studies the mind and how it influences behaviour
in the same order as the people or things already mentioned
zh_definition: 分别；各自；顺序为；依次为

en_definition: the division between two qualities or conditions
zh_definition: 两种品质（或状况）之间的分界线

en_definition: to make something develop or become active; to encourage something
based on general ideas and not on any particular real person, thing or situation
an idea or a principle that is connected with something abstract
perfect; most suitable
zh_definition: 完美的；理想的；最合适的

en_definition: to repeat the exact words that another person has said or written
exact words
information that is discovered as the result of research into something
not genuine; appearing to be something it is not
an amount of money that is taken off the usual cost of something
happening, done or published once a week or every week
happening once a month or every month
the act of printing a book, a magazine, etc. and making it available to the public; a book, a magazine, etc. that has been published
connected with education, especially studying in schools and universities
a small house, especially in the country
a plant grown in warm countries for the soft white hairs around its seeds that are used to make cloth and thread
a plant that is grown in large quantities, especially as food
to cut and gather a crop
the time of year when the crops are gathered in on a farm, etc.; the act of cutting and gathering crops
a firm promise that you will do something or that something will happen
to promise to do something; to promise something will happen
(of things) that you can get, buy or find
zh_definition: 可获得的；可购得的；可找到的

en_definition: concentrating on a limited field, market, or area of activity
a person who is an expert in a particular area of work or study
morally correct or acceptable
connected with beliefs and principles about what is right and wrong
a place in a school or a factory where food is provided
to recognize somebody / something and be able to say who or what they are
something that you think is more important than other things and should be dealt with first
not perfect; not working or made correctly
zh_definition: 不完美的；有错误的；有缺陷的

en_definition: to say that you are annoyed, unhappy or not satisfied about somebody / something
wrong; not correct or true
made to look real to cheat people
zh_definition: 错误的；不正确的；不真实的

en_definition: used when speaking or writing to a woman in a formal or business situation
to change something slightly to make it more suitable for a new set of conditions or to make it work better
not tightly packed together; not solid or hard
in a loyal way
accurately; carefully
the point from which something starts; the cause of something
to put clothes, etc. into a bag in preparation for a trip away from home
a case with flat sides and a handle, used for carrying clothes, etc. when you are travelling
connected with the moon
friendly, peaceful and without any disagreement
the act of a group of people wishing somebody happiness, success, etc. by drinking a glass of something, especially alcohol, at the same time
one of the things from which something is made, especially one of the foods that are used together to make a particular dish
a shop that sells food and other things used in the home
objects such as rings and necklaces that people wear as decoration
a general direction where a situation is developing
to cover something completely in paper or other material, for example when you are giving it as a present
to use something to try to make a profit, especially in a way that other people do not approve of
zh_definition: （尤指不择手段地）利用......牟利；商业化

en_definition: a method of advertising your products without letting people realize you are trying to make them buy something
